text: Instructions: If you have been assigned the school board as your client, drag their information tile into your workspace.

INFORMATION TILE

The client: The school board

Their end goal: To determine how long the school building should be open each day. They want the school open as a place of study and learning when needed, but it can also be expensive to keep open. Therefore, they want to know when it is unused and can be closed.

Their first task for you: Help determine how much time students typically spend at school.
